name: Super Rally Championship
description:
THE RALLY SIMULATION

Build your profile, get your rally car driving license before championship starts. Build your own rally team, find Sponsor for your rally team and build your garage. Start the championship to be the best driver in the World.

THE CARS

Get behind the wheel of legendary rally cars. Build your own racing garage.

THE CONTROL

With the critically acclaimed rally handling, damage and physics model under the hood, feel the thrill of putting pedal to metal across different surface types and blast through beautiful, challenging environments.

THE CHALLENGE

Championships and customize your experience with different controls schemes and views. Post your best time to the leaderboards and unlock achievements.

RALLY THE WORLD

- Compete in the 11 rally races and win the Championship.

-Greece
-Finland
-Norway
-Turkey
-Spain
-England
-France
-Italy
-Iceland
-Holland
-Switzerland

IMPORTANT:

- For optimal performance we recommend you restart your device and close other applications before playing
- Privacy Policy is available at: http://mobimindgames.com/privacypolicy.html
